server.rest.controllers

Class ContractorsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.rest.controllers.Controller
      • server.rest.controllers.ContractorsController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins={"http://localhost:1234","http://theterminal.s3-website.us-west-2.amazonaws.com"},
             methods={GET,POST})
 @RestController
public class ContractorsController
extends Controller
    Controller for Contractors Table Provides all the REST endpoints related to Contractors and stored SQL procedures

      • editContractor

        public java.util.ArrayList<Contractor> editContractor(java.lang.String id,
                                                      java.lang.String firstName,
                                                      java.lang.String lastName,
                                                      java.lang.String agencySource,
                                                      java.lang.String status)
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Edits a Contractor in the Database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the contractor to be edited
        firstName - first name of the contractor
        lastName - last name of the contractor
        agencySource - agency source of the contractor
        status - status of the contractor
        Returns:
        list of contractor with just the edited contractor as an element in it.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if something goes wrong whilst querying/updating the database

        Throws:

      • addContractor

        public java.util.ArrayList<Contractor> addContractor(java.lang.String firstName,
                                                     java.lang.String surName,
                                                     java.lang.String agencySource,
                                                     java.lang.String status)
                                              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a contractor to the database
        Parameters:
        firstName - First Name of the contractor
        surName - Last Name of the Contractor
        agencySource - Agency Source of the Contractor
        status - Status of the contractor
        Returns:
        The list of Contractors with only the newly added contractor as its element
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if something oes wrong whilst querying/updating the database

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        @RequestMapping(value="/contractors/add")
public ContractorsResponse addContractor(@RequestParam(value="token")
                                                                                    java.lang.String token,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="firstName")
                                                                                    java.lang.String firstName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="surname")
                                                                                    java.lang.String surName,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="agencySource")
                                                                                    java.lang.String agencySource,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="status")
                                                                                    java.lang.String status)
        REST API call for adding a new contractor
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the user making the api call
        firstName - The first name of the new Contractor
        surName - The last name of the new Contractor
        agencySource - The agency source of the new Contractor
        status - The status of the new Contractor
        Returns:
        Response that contains the added contractor or an error response

        @CrossOrigin(value="*")
 @RequestMapping(value="/contractors/edit/engagementContract",
                method=POST)
public Response editEngagementContract(@RequestParam(value="token")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String token,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="startDate")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="endDate")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String endDate,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="rateType")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String rateType,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="projectName")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String projectName,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="chargeType")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String chargeType,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="dailyAllowance")
                                                                                                                                                              int dailyAllowance,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="originalDocumentation")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String originalDocumentation,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="terminationNum")
                                                                                                                                                              int terminationNum,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="contractorId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String contractorId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="resourceId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String resourceId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="hrPositionId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String hrPositionId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="hrPayGradeId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String hrPayGradeId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="costCenterId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String costCenterId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="reportingManagerId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String reportingManagerId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="currencyCode")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String currencyCode,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="mainSkillId")
                                                                                                                                                              java.lang.String mainSkillId,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="timeMaterialTerms")
                                                                                                                                                              int timeMaterialTerms,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="poNum")
                                                                                                                                                              int poNum,
                                                                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="hourlyrate")
                                                                                                                                                              int hourlyRate)
        REST API call to edit an engagement contract of a specific Contractor
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the user making the API call
        id - The id of the engagement contract
        startDate - The start date of the contract
        endDate - The end date of the contract
        rateType - The rate type of the contract
        projectName - The project name of the contract
        chargeType - The charge type of the contract
        dailyAllowance - The daily allowance of the contract
        originalDocumentation - The original documentation of the contract
        terminationNum - The termination number of the contract
        contractorId - The id of the contractor associated with the contractor
        resourceId - The id of the resource provided
        hrPositionId - The id of the hr position
        hrPayGradeId - The id of the hr pay grade for the contract
        costCenterId - The id of the cost center associated with the contractor
        reportingManagerId - The id of the reporting manager
        currencyCode - The currency code for all the input fields
        mainSkillId - The id of the skill that was used for hiring
        timeMaterialTerms - The time material terms for the contract
        poNum -
        hourlyRate - The hourly rate negotiated for this contract
        Returns:
        Response stating whether the edit was successful or not

        REST API call to edit an engagement contract of a specific Contractor
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the user making the API call
        startDate - The start date of the contract
        endDate - The end date of the contract
        rateType - The rate type of the contract
        projectName - The project name of the contract
        chargeType - The charge type of the contract

        timeMaterialTerms - The time material terms for the contract
        poNum -
        hourlyRate - The hourly rate negotiated for this contract
        Returns:
        Response stating whether the edit was successful or not

        @RequestMapping(value="/contractors/edit")
public ContractorsResponse editContractor(@RequestParam(value="token")
                                                                                      java.lang.String token,
                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="id")
                                                                                      java.lang.String id,

                                                                                      java.lang.String firstName,

                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="agencySource")
                                                                                      java.lang.String agencySource,
                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="status")
                                                                                      java.lang.String status)
        REST API call to edit a contractor
        Parameters:
        token - The unique token of the user making the API call
        id - The id of the contractor
        firstName - The first name of the Contractor
        surname - The last name of the Contractor
        agencySource - The Agency Source of the Contractor
        status - The status of the Contractor
        Returns:
        Response that contains the edited contractor or an error response
